Заголовок 1-го уровня

  1. Request for the page is sent to the web server
  2. web server determines that .aspx file extension is registered with ASP.NET (if another ext → ASP.NET is not involved)
  3. If the first time a page requested, ASP.NET creates APP domain + COMPILES WEB PAGE CODE
  4. .aspx acts like a miniature program (firing events)
  5. ASP.NET asks control to render to HTML MARKUP
